entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • shell flyout background image does not display on windows platform #21472
  • Picker() on Mac Catalyst does not display dialog with items #21470
  • iOS "Unable to load image file" on implicitly referenced project #21469
  • [Android] Shell.FlyoutIcon doesn't show correctly. #21466
  • [Android] System.ObjectDisposedException: ObjectDisposed_StreamClosed #21461
  • Scale transform seems relative instead of absolute? #21457
  • TableSection.TextColor does not work with DynamicResource #21456
  • iOS PopModalAsync causes memory leaks #21453
  • iOS: App Crashes when ObservableCollection is modified inside a Task #21452
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [Windows] Performance of gesture updating #21449
  • Deployment or Debug removes files in FileSystem.AppDataDirectory #21445
  • The entry input cursor and the lower border line color have related properties that can be set directly. #21441

Closed

  • [iOS] Physical Phone device won't open any Maui App with .Net 8 #21444
  • [Documentation] Dev Guide for Mac needs some refreshing #21465
  • [WinUI] Add tests for loading fonts when unpackaged #20791
    .NET 8 SR4
  • RadioButton IsChecked Binding does not work on iOS nor Windows #11125
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in Android TabbedPageManager #21393
  • UdpClient on IOS: No route to host #21451
  • MeasureFirstItem makes items disappear on Android #7562
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [MacCatallyst-arm64] app file size is extremely large for custom configuration #21332
  • The color of the Entry input cursor should be the same as the text color, and the color of the lower border can be modified. #21442

PullRequests

Created

  • Move 10234 to Appium #21471
  • [Windows] Ensure images in buttons never scale up, only down #21463
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [xaml] improve performance in debug-mode #21460
  • Remove new TypeConversionAppBuilderExtensions API #21459
  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458
    community ✨
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [XC] Fix x:DataType resolution for BindingContext #21454
  • [WinUI] Allocate less when updating gestures #21450
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures

Merged

  • Make the dev docs more betterer #21467
    community ✨
  • Still measure children if size is known on CV #21409
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [android] Add null check to help with #21393 #21432
    platform/android 🤖, area/TabbedPage
  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 1/2) #21050
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Cache full app package file path #21246
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨

Updated

  • [macOS] Make window overlay to redraw correctly during window resizing #21371
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, control-window
  • [iOS] Use updated APIs for the button with images #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    area/testing, community ✨
  • [Xaml] Simplify loading ResourceDictionary from Source #21429
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 2/2) #21052
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #21392
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Revert "[iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse (#14… #21400
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [android] avoid `OnLayout()` for `Label` #21291
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/templates 📄
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Fix AdaptiveTrigger not working as expected #20987
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/iOS 🍎, control-window
  • [UI Testing] Split mouse and touch Appium actions and added pending ones (TouchAndHold etc) #21305
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [XamlC] Avoid calling ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource #20776
    area/Xaml </>, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fix for WebView Error when changing page with WebView loading a page #21436
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
